question: A student is visiting a local limestone quarry and finds fossils of seashells. The quarry is located hundreds of miles from the ocean. The fossils best indicate that
candidate_answers: (A) this area was once below sea level. (B) global temperature changed over time. (C) erosion took place after a flood. (D) volcanic activity affected the area.
answer: this area was once below sea level.
label: A
